attributes.title: Screws up your phone!
attributes.review: The app glitches so much, and now that I have it, all of my apps are doing it. I’ve turned it off and on and all that stuff but it’s still all screwed up and I’m so annoyed.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app made my phone look so much grosser. This app is running in the background, is it stealing my information? I have all my settings off for apps running during being closed. SHUT DOWN THIS APP. So much storage is taken too. MAKE THE APPSTORE BETTER AGAIN. DELETE THIS APP

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This will give you viruses and get your location and send someone to your  house I really was trying to use it to vote for the best President but I got so much viruses and it turned on my location without my consen.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app actually caused my phone to overheat due to all the notifications my phone caught on fire. It’s the worst app ever and after reading some of the reviews I see that many people agree with me. Take this app off the apple store !!

attributes.title: SO BAD🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: 🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️ let’s go gen z!!!  Let’s get this app gone!!! Anyway imma find a dumb reason now. This app gave my phone the worst glitching it’s ever had. I’m also having very bad puking problem because of the name trump 🤮... This app needs fixed. TIKTOK LIVES MATTER!!!!!!!

This app is terrible!! Upon opening it I knew that my experience would not be satisfactory. It was difficult to use, used grammar that mimicked brainwashing, and was all around a TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE. Don’t get this app! If you do, leave it a fair 1 star review.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app convinced my mother’s dog walkers neighbor to steal from target. Then she and her entire family had to go to an underwater ball which turned out to be Atlantis and they all drowned. Would not recommend getting this app unless you want to die.

attributes.title: fake news
attributes.review: this app called me fat and ugly. this is fake news because i am the hottest person i know. thought i was going to get a discount on trumps own brand of fake tan, but was disappointed to see a whiny ugly baby all over the screen. that probably should be qualified as a hate crime. ugly interface too. the app should probably be banned because its definitely giving our information to the russian governnent. terrible app. sad!

attributes.title: keeps crashing
attributes.review: This is the most pathetic and useless app I have ever used. The app crashes every second and keeps oinking? Is this app for pigs or something it is oinking like I am suppose to understand smh...please add translations for us non-pig people
